description.other_details: TThis work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/.
Menstrual cycle, Draft Archetype [Internet]. National eHealth Transition Authority, NEHTA Clinical Knowledge Manager [cited: 2015-03-16]. No longer available.

details.purpose: *To record details about the menstrual cycle, including the menses and associated symptoms.(en)
details.use:
*Use to record details about a single menstrual cycle - using the 'Specific cycle' event.
Use to record details about the typical, or average, menstrual pattern over multiple cycles - using the 'Multiple cycles' event.
Use some of the elements to record details about menstrual bleeding and associated symptoms on a single day eg as part of a menstrual diary - using the 'Specific day in a cycle' event.(en)

details.purpose: Para registar detalhes sobre o ciclo menstrual, incluindo a menstruação e sintomas associados.
details.use:
Usar para gravar detalhes sobre um único ciclo menstrual - usando o evento "ciclo específico".
Usar para gravar detalhes sobre o padrão menstrual típico ou médio, ao longo de vários ciclos - usando o evento dos "vários ciclos ".
Usar alguns dos elementos para gravar detalhes sobre o sangramento menstrual e sintomas associados em um único dia, por exemplo, como parte de um diário menstrual - usando o "dia específico em um ciclo de 'evento.

details.purpose: To record details about the menses.
details.use:
Use to record details about the menses.
Use to record the LNMP using the Start date and event of 'Last normal menstrual period'.

translations.author: Marivan Abrahão, Gabriela Alves, Adriana Kitajima e Maria Ângela Scatena
Core Consulting
contato@coreconsulting.com.br

items.items: The regular discharge of blood and mucosal tissue (known as menses) from the inner lining of the uterus through the vagina.
Date of onset of menstrual bleeding in a single cycle.
Duration of menstrual bleeding in a single cycle or typical duration over many cycles.
Narrative description of the menstrual bleeding.
Relative description of amount of menstrual flow.
Very heavy menstrual flow, often causing additional problems such as flooding and clotting.
Presence of blood clots in the menstrual flow.
Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.
Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.
Presence of heavy menstrual flow that exceeded capacity of sanitary napkins and other menstrual products to absorb the menstrual flow.
Flooding occurred during the menstrual flow.
Flooding did not occur during the menstrual flow.
Details about symptoms related to menses. For example, menstrual cramps or headaches.
Identify concurrent hormone or intrauterine contraception use. Coding with a terminology is preferred, where possible.
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.
The last normal menstrual period experienced by the woman.
Registre as informações sobre um ciclo menstrual, um único dia durante um ciclo menstrual.
Data de início do sangramento menstrual num único ciclo.
Duração do sangramento menstrual num único ciclo de duração típica ou ao longo de muitos ciclos.
*Relative description of amount of menstrual flow.(en)
Fluxo menstrual muito intenso, muitas vezes causando problemas adicionais, tais como vazamentos e coagulação.
Presença de coágulos sanguíneos no fluxo menstrual.
*Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
Presença de fluxo menstrual intenso, que excedeu a capacidade dos absorventes higiênicos e outros produtos para absorver o fluxo menstrual.
*Flooding did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
Os detalhes sobre os sintomas relacionados à menstruação. Por exemplo, cólicas menstruais e dores de cabeça.
Identificar uso o concomitante de hormônio ou de contraceptivo intra-uterino. A coodificação com uma terminologia é preferível, quando possível.
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*The last normal menstrual period experienced by the woman.(en)
Kirjaa tietoja kuukautiskierrosta, yksittäinen kuukautiskierron päivä.
Kuukautisvuodon kesto yksittäisessä kierrossa tai tyypillinen kesto useita kiertoja tarkasteltaessa.
Erittäin runsas kuukautisvuoto, joka aiheuttaa usein lisäongelmia, kuten tulvimista ja hyytymistä.
*Blood clots occurred during the menstrual flow.(en)
*Blood clots did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
Niin runsas kuukautisvuoto, että se ylittää terveyssiteiden ja muiden kuukautistuotteiden imukyvyn.
*Flooding did not occur during the menstrual flow.(en)
Tietoja kuukautisiin liittyvistä oireista. Esimerkiksi kuukautiskivut tai päänsäryt.
Kirjaa samanaikainen hormonaalisen tai kohdunsisäisen ehkäisyn käyttö. On suositeltavaa tehdä koodaus terminologiaa käyttäen aina kun mahdollista.
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
*The last normal menstrual period experienced by the woman.(en)
